page.title: 14 Recreation
page.content: Following a questionaire which 90% of the inhabitants of Pillerton Hersey,Pillerton Priors and Fulready completed we discovered a wide selection of leisure activities.The two most popular were{Reading}and Gardening followed by{Watching {Television}.We recorded the others in order of popularity{Walking,Sports}to include Football,cricket,tennis, foxhunting, shooting,billiards badminton,snooker and golf.{Cookery,} {Flower Arranging Car Repairs,Stamp {Collecting,Woodwork, Metalwork,Parish {Council,Card Games}(to include whist and bridge){Chess, Womens Institute, {Campanology,Church Activities,Country {Pursuits}to include young farmers Grassland Society Foresty.
